ComicInfo.Summary:
Covers characters, teams, locations, and objects A-M
Featured profiles (in order)
Ace Duck, Al'Falqa, April O'Neil, Armaggon, Azrael, Bebop, Bellybomb, Bloodbath, Bookwurm, Boss Salvage, Cap'n Mossback, Captain Agamatta, Charlie Llama, Cherubae, Chien Khan, Codename: Chameleon, Cryin' Houn', Cudley the Cowlick, Dimension X, Donatello, Dreadmon, Four Horsemen, Foot Soldiers, Foot Supersoldiers, Giant Foot Supersoldiers, Fu Sheng, Ghost of 13 Mile Island, Glublubs, Glyph, Grem, Izanagi & Izanami, Jagwar, Jang La, Juntarra, Katmandu, Kid Terra, Knucklehead, Krang, Leatherhead, Leonardo, Maligna, Mang-Thrasha, Man-Ray, Merdude, Michaelangelo, Mondo Gecko, Monsterex, Mutagen.
